thread.title: Reservations can now be made for renovated Paris Ritz
thread.title_full: Reservations can now be made for renovated Paris Ritz

title: Reservations can now be made for renovated Paris Ritz
text:
Reservations can now be made for renovated Paris Ritz Saturday August 1, 2015 Print Article 
The Ritz Paris at Place Vendome on July 30, 2012, when the renovation project began. — Afp-Relaxnews pic PARIS, Aug 1 — Travellers can now book rooms at the newly renovated Ritz Paris for dates starting next year. 
The reopening of the five-star hotel looks set to roll out at the end of 2015, but travelers wanting to make reservations may have to wait, as bookings are now available for dates starting March 14, 2016. 
The Ritz Paris has been undergoing renovations since July 2012, and the project is believed to be the biggest makeover in the hotel's 117 year-old history. 
The refurbishment includes a new spa by luxury fashion brand Chanel, called “Chanel au Ritz Paris.” 
Rooms start at US$985 (RM3,764) per night. — Afp-Relaxnews More Stories for You:
